text: Panama Pasama () is a 1968 Indian Tamil-language film, directed and produced by K. S. Gopalakrishnan. The film stars Gemini Ganesan and B. Saroja Devi. The film had musical score by K. V. Mahadevan. The film was remade the following year in Hindi as Paisa Ya Pyaar. == Cast == ;Lead actors *Gemini Ganesan as Shankar *B. Saroja Devi as Shanthi *Nagesh as Deva ;Male supporting actors *T. Sakunthala *Radhabhai == Soundtrack == The music was composed by K. V. Mahadevan, while the lyrics were written by Kannadasan.
